source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000010_THANCRED<tab>Now then...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000010_THANCRED<tab>さてと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000020_THANCRED<tab>'Tis I. The situation may be more complicated than we anticipated.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000020_THANCRED<tab>俺だ、サンクレッドだ。
伝えておきたいことがあってね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000030_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. I shall remain watchful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000030_URIANGER<tab>……ええ、わかりました。
何か動きがあれば連絡しましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000040_URIANGER<tab>Ere thou goest─another matter requireth thine attention. A young maiden, full eager to─
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000040_URIANGER<tab>それはそうと……サンクレッド。
時折、あなたを訪ねて女性の方がいらっしゃいます……。
如何に応じるべきでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000050_URIANGER<tab>Wherefore inquirest thou of her fairness!? Very well. Be she damsel or devil, I shall direct her steps to Revenant's Toll.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000050_URIANGER<tab>……なるほど、無難に……ですか……。
なれば、答えはレヴナンツトールにありと伝えましょう。
貴方の想い人、あるいは仇敵は北方にあり、と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000060_URIANGER<tab>...Save thine insinuations for one given to such impropriety. Thou shalt not find me amenable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000060_URIANGER<tab>己の過去に勝りし敵はなしと申します。
ゆめゆめ、お忘れなきように……
それでは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000070_YUGIRI<tab>(-???-)Far across the sea, from the land of Doma, have we traveled. We seek audience with the ruler of these lands. Who here speaks for you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_000070_YUGIRI<tab>(-？？？？-)我々は、東方の「ドマ」からやってきたものだ。
どなたか、この国の王が何処におわすか、
教えてはいただけぬか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100010_YUGIRI<tab>We have traveled some several thousand malms across the sea, from the nation of Doma, in hopes that we might find sanctuary in these lands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100010_YUGIRI<tab>我が名は「ユウギリ」。
我らは、東州オサード小大陸の辺境都市「ドマ」から、
海を越えて逃れてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Sanctuary, Lady Yugiri?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100020_ALPHINAUD<tab>逃れてきた？
あまりよい言い回しではないようだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100030_YUGIRI<tab>Aye. Lying within Othard, Doma was under the dominion of the Garlean Empire, as I am sure you are aware.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100030_YUGIRI<tab>我らの故郷ドマは、ガレマール帝国の属州だった。
……無論、望んでそうなったわけではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100040_YUGIRI<tab>When the war of succession broke out in Garlemald, we espied an opportunity to free ourselves from the yoke of imperial oppression, and took up arms.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100040_YUGIRI<tab>少し前の話だ……。
帝国内で次期皇帝の座を巡り、内乱が勃発した。
我らは、それを好機と考え反乱を起こしたのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100050_YUGIRI<tab>...Only to be crushed. And so I gathered what few Domans escaped the reckoning, and guided them hither to your shores.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100050_YUGIRI<tab>……そう、敗れたのだ。
私はドマにいた同族を隠れ里へ逃がした後、
残った者たちを先導し、エオルゼアへと落ち延びてきた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100060_ALPHINAUD<tab>A war of succession...? Then the Emperor... Forgive me, you said that Doma “was” under imperial rule, did you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100060_ALPHINAUD<tab>まさか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100070_YUGIRI<tab>Doma is gone. Razed to the ground as an example to the other provinces.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100070_YUGIRI<tab>ああ、ご想像のとおり。
この世には、すでにドマという都市は存在せぬ。
帝国による粛清により、文字どおり滅亡したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100080_ALPHINAUD<tab>Twelve have mercy... And your people?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100080_ALPHINAUD<tab>……では、あなた方は、
この国に難民の受け入れを求めているのか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100090_YUGIRI<tab>On a ship anchored in Vesper Bay, flying borrowed colors.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100090_YUGIRI<tab>そうだ。
先ほどの港街……ベスパーベイといったか。
あの港の沖に、商船に擬装した大型船を停泊させている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100100_YUGIRI<tab>Many were complicit in the rebellion, or are kin to those who were. They will not come ashore until I send word that it is safe to do so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100100_YUGIRI<tab>難民たちの多くは、帝国への反乱に参加した者とその家族。
我らは、その代表として交渉にきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100110_YUGIRI<tab>I sought an audience with your rulers, but was summarily refused.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100110_YUGIRI<tab>どうにか、この国の王、あるいは権力者に談判できればと思い、
このウルダハまでやってきたのだが……
門前払いを食らっていたところだったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100120_ALPHINAUD<tab>The lords of Ul'dah are not wont to entertain foreign refugees without suitable encouragement.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100120_ALPHINAUD<tab>異邦の民がこぞって王宮に押しかければ、そうもなろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100130_YUGIRI<tab>Mayhap I was foolish to expect otherwise. But our supplies run low, and we have young ones in urgent need of care.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100130_YUGIRI<tab>だろうな、そこは浅はかだったよ。
ドマを脱出してからというもの、ろくに食事も取れず、
船の中には大勢の子どもたちもいる……焦っていたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100140_YUGIRI<tab>I have seen the tents outside the gates, however. We are not the first to seek asylum, nor will we be the last.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100140_YUGIRI<tab>それに、ここに来るまでの間、
我らと同じような難民らしき群衆をみた。
……どうやら、この国もいろいろと複雑な事情らしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100150_ALPHINAUD<tab>...Be that as it may, Ul'dah is no friend to Garlemald. Your tale would stir the hearts of many men and women here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100150_ALPHINAUD<tab>なるほど、事情は理解できた。
我々にとっても、ガレマール帝国は敵だ。
いつ、あなた方と同じような境遇に陥るとも限らない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>The sultana and the Syndicate will not be so easily swayed─but I shall see that you are granted an opportunity to plead your case.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100160_ALPHINAUD<tab>……私が王宮に取り次いでみよう。
結果までは保証できないが、話くらいはできるはずだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100170_YUGIRI<tab>This is within your power?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100170_YUGIRI<tab>それは本当か！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well...far be it from me to boast, but I do have the ear of certain influential individuals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100180_ALPHINAUD<tab>任せてくれたまえ。
こうみえても、お偉い方には顔が利くのでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100190_YUGIRI<tab>I am in your debt.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100190_YUGIRI<tab>かたじけない、助かる。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lady Yugiri, forgive me for observing, but...your choice of attire seems like to evoke feelings of mistrust.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100200_ALPHINAUD<tab>しかし……ユウギリ殿。
あなたは、ずいぶんと変わった身なりをされている。
……それに、このエオルゼアでは見慣れぬ種族のようだね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100210_YUGIRI<tab>Men are wont to fear the unfamiliar. We know this from experience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100210_YUGIRI<tab>この格好については、無礼を許してほしい。
姿形が異なる者が現れれば、いらぬ騒ぎを呼び兼ねない。
……そうした経験があるのでね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100220_YUGIRI<tab>We seek only to spare the people of Ul'dah unnecessary disquiet.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100220_YUGIRI<tab>我らは助けをこう身……
この地に不要な波風を立てたい訳ではないのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100230_ALPHINAUD<tab>I shall defer to your experience, then.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100230_ALPHINAUD<tab>……なるほど、それは賢明な判断だろう。
無礼だなど、とんでもない。
気にすることはないよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100240_YUGIRI<tab>I thank you for your understanding.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100240_YUGIRI<tab>理解と心遣いに感謝する。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100250_ALPHINAUD<tab>It seems I have urgent business with the Flame General. I leave our guests in your capable hands.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_100250_ALPHINAUD<tab>では、私はさっそくラウバーン局長に話をしてこよう。
しばらくの間、この方々の面倒をみてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200000_YUGIRI<tab>I, Yugiri of Doma, am honored to meet you at last, Your Grace. To mark this auspicious occasion, I should like to present to you the finest treasures our humble nation has to offer...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200000_YUGIRI<tab>会談に応じていただき感謝いたす、砂の女王よ。
本来ならば、東方ゆかりの品々を持参し、
礼を尽くすべきところ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200010_YUGIRI<tab>Alas, the circumstances which have brought me here today have divested me of both time and dignity. I come before you as a pauper in direst need of aid─to request that you grant my people asylum.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200010_YUGIRI<tab>しかし、落ち人たる我らには、富も時間もありませぬ。
無礼を承知で、嘆願させていただきたい……
我らドマの民を、ウルダハに受け入れてくださらぬか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I, Nanamo, seventeenth in the line of Ul, welcome you to our city. Be at ease, Lady Yugiri.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200020_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>ウルダハ第十七代国王、ナナモ・ウル・ナモである。
……ユウギリといったか、まずは楽にされよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Although I myself have heard the tale of your misfortune, I would ask that you recount it once more for the benefit of the others here present.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200030_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>アルフィノより、話は聞いている。
なんでも、ガレマール帝国に祖国を滅ぼされたというが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200040_YUGIRI<tab>As you wish, Your Grace. For many years, my nation, Doma, suffered under the yoke of imperial rule, and my people yearned to be free. Thus, when a war of succession broke out in Garlemald, we sought to take advantage of the chaos and reclaim our liberty.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200040_YUGIRI<tab>左様です、陛下。
……帝国は現在、次期皇帝争いを機とした内乱の渦中。
内乱の影響は帝都をもちろん、辺境にまで及んでおります。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200050_YUGIRI<tab>Alas, our enemy proved less preoccupied than we had hoped, and our rebellion was put down in the most brutal fashion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200050_YUGIRI<tab>我々ドマの民は、その混乱に乗じ、
ガレマール帝国からの独立戦争に挑んだものの敗北。
従属か滅亡か……帝国は見せしめに我らの都を焼いたのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200060_RAUBAHN<tab>Those who survived─how many do they number?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200060_RAUBAHN<tab>貴公らは、ドマからの船で海を渡ったという。
難民の数はいかほどだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200070_YUGIRI<tab>More than two hundred souls huddle within the cramped confines of our own galleon's hold. Yet this figure accounts for but one of a number of ships which escaped the purge.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200070_YUGIRI<tab>商船に擬装した大型船が一隻……。
その船倉には二百を超える同胞が、身を寄せ合っております。
……ただし我らも、ドマから逃れた船の一隻に過ぎませぬ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200080_YUGIRI<tab>It is my hope that you will allow us all to dwell within your walls. Should that prove unfeasible, however, I humbly ask that you accept as many of my people as your resources allow.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200080_YUGIRI<tab>こちらで受け入れていただけるようなら、
可能な限り同胞を呼び寄せたいと願っております。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200090_YUGIRI<tab>Pray understand, we do not beg a boon, but propose instead an arrangement. We would serve─as soldiers or tradesmen─until our debt is repaid.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200090_YUGIRI<tab>無論、タダでなどと都合の良いことは思っておらぬ。
我らを兵や働き手として使って構わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200100_RAUBAHN<tab>What are the Syndicate's opinions on this matter?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200100_RAUBAHN<tab>どうであろう、砂蠍衆の方々。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>I, for one, think it's a marvelous idea. Lady Yugiri and her people strike me as an industrious lot, and there are parts of the city which have yet to be fully restored. If they are willing to work, I see no reason not to let them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200110_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>良い提案ではないか。
第七霊災からこっち、復興やら開拓やらで、
人手が不足しているのは確かなのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200120_ALPHINAUD<tab>The head of the Mirage Trust is not known for his generosity. He sees profit in this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200120_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼は「ミラージュトラスト」の総帥、テレジ・アデレジだ。
ウルダハ金融界を牛耳っている男さ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200130_RAUBAHN<tab>I agree. That said, these are foreign refugees. To admit them would require a formal resolution. Shall we call a vote?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200130_RAUBAHN<tab>異国の民だ……法の整備は必要になろうが、
それを前提とした上でも、
受け入れを検討してよいのではないか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200140_LOLORITO<tab>The law is the law.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200140_LOLORITO<tab>残念ながら、賛成はできかねますな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Lord Lolorito?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200150_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>なぜです、ロロリト殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200160_LOLORITO<tab>Tell me: are you blind or willfully ignorant? Even now, our streets are choked with the displaced victims of the Calamity and Ala Mhigan refugees.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200160_LOLORITO<tab>現状を見よ！　霊災難民とアラミゴからの流民で、
すでにウルダハは溢れているではないか。
しかも、そのほとんどは、すでに5年以上も居座ったままだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200170_LOLORITO<tab>They live hand-to-mouth, subsisting on aid provided by the Immortal Flames─the cost of which grows ever higher!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200170_LOLORITO<tab>不滅隊が打ち出した難民救済策により、
難民に支払う援助金は増える一方。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200180_LOLORITO<tab>The wealth of Ul'dah is not without limits, my friends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200180_LOLORITO<tab>かつて「黄金都市」と呼ばれた面影もないほど、
国庫の状況は逼迫しておるではないか。
とてもではないが、異国の民など受け入れる余裕はない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200190_LOLORITO<tab>And need I remind you that these refugees are prone to violence and criminal activity? You have all read the reports, I think?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200190_LOLORITO<tab>それに、近頃は難民による犯罪も増えている。
テレジ・アデレジ殿にも、報告があがっていよう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200200_LOLORITO<tab>Without homes or employment, it is only a matter of time before men grow desperate and take that which they imagine has been unjustly denied them. Yet, knowing this, you would have us swell their ranks. Mayhap you think the Brass Blades and the Flames are not hard-pressed enough?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200200_LOLORITO<tab>難民の多くは職を持てず、悪事に手を染めている。
今や、不滅隊と銅刃団を回しても、
検挙しきれぬほどになっているのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Some say the chairman of the East Aldenard Trading Company passes gil thrice daily. This may explain how he came to be the wealthiest man in Ul'dah. Or it may simply be that he's ruthless beyond reckoning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200210_ALPHINAUD<tab>彼はロロリト……東アルデナード商会の会長で、
百億ギルの男と言われるほどの富豪だ。
……砂蠍衆における、事実上の最高権力者だよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Surely the sultanate can support the few hundred Domans Lady Yugiri represents? That our resources have been taxed I do not deny, but we are hardly in danger of financial collapse.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>……ロロリト。
いくら財政が逼迫しているからとはいえ、
ユウギリの一団くらいの受け入れは可能なはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200230_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I move that an exception be made.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200230_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>犯罪に関しても、きちんと法を引き直し……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200240_LOLORITO<tab>An exception, Your Grace? I am suddenly reminded of a similar debate some years ago, regarding a number of Ala Mhigan refugees, if memory serves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200240_LOLORITO<tab>これはこれは……。
面白いことを申されますな、ナナモ陛下。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200250_LOLORITO<tab>What were your words that day? Ah, yes: “The law is the law.” And so our visitors remained in Little Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200250_LOLORITO<tab>その法とやら、いつになったら、
王党派から提示していただけるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200260_LOLORITO<tab>Mayhap our wise and benevolent sultana would be so good as to enlighten us as to which other of our laws should not be upheld?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200260_LOLORITO<tab>アラミゴからの難民がザナラーンに集い、何年になります？
あの時も、法だ法だと言いながら、結局は、
放置同然にリトルアラミゴを渡しただけではありませぬか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200270_RAUBAHN<tab>Mind your tongue, Lolorito.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200270_RAUBAHN<tab>口が過ぎるぞ、ロロリト殿！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200280_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>My lord, I share your concern for the welfare of our great nation, but we must endeavor to take a longer view. You know as well as I that people can be a resource still more precious than gil.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200280_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>しかし、人は宝だぞ。
将来的に、このウルダハを強くする礎となるやもしれん。
労働者としての受け入れを再度検討してみるのは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200290_LOLORITO<tab>Precious or not, they were never yet so reliable. And unlike those who frequent your establishment, I have no desire to gamble with my future.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200290_LOLORITO<tab>だから、テレジ・アデレジ殿はぬるいと言われるのだ。
……人や金は、国の柱だ。
国の礎は、堅固な統治にほかならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200300_LOLORITO<tab>Ul'dah's greatest asset is, and has ever been, her material wealth. We risk this at our peril.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200300_LOLORITO<tab>今必要なのは、ウルダハを強くする礎だ。
風化した礎に柱を建てたところで、
ウルダハを強くすることなどできようか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200310_LOLORITO<tab>One need only look to Teledji Adeledji's example for evidence of the danger in allowing sentiment to dictate policy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200310_LOLORITO<tab>そういえば、テレジ・アデレジ殿。
最近は「プラチナミラージュ」も
売上が振るわないようではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200320_LOLORITO<tab>How far the vaunted Mirage hath fallen, both in repute and profitability, since he began employing refugees...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200320_LOLORITO<tab>安い賃金で難民をこき使った結果、
質まで落ちてきているのではないかね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200330_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>How I choose to conduct my affairs is not your concern, my lord!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200330_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>クッ、ムム……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200340_RAUBAHN<tab>A proposal has been tabled. Given its urgency, I move we forgo further debate and call a vote.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200340_RAUBAHN<tab>双方、落ち着かれよ。
……では、採決を取りたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200350_RAUBAHN<tab>To accept the Doman refugees or not. Those in favor, I bid you remain. Those opposed, I bid you leave.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200350_RAUBAHN<tab>ドマからの難民を受け入れるか、否か。
受け入れに賛成の者はこの場に残り、
反対の者は退出していただきたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Would that it were within my power to welcome you and your people, Lady Yugiri. As you have observed, however, my authority in such matters is regrettably limited.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>すまぬ、ユウギリよ……。
この国では、王の力などこの程度のものなのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Without the consent of the Syndicate, I cannot act.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>王権は弱まり、今や砂蠍衆の合議なくして国は動かせぬ。
わらわが不甲斐ないばかりに……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200380_YUGIRI<tab>I understand, Your Grace. And I appreciate all that you have done on our behalf.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200380_YUGIRI<tab>いえ、ナナモ・ウル・ナモ陛下。
ご検討いただいただけでも、有難き幸せ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200390_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>The nerve of the man... If that bastard had not forsaken the eastern trade route, Little Ala Mhigo would now be thriving.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200390_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……しかしロロリトの奴め、腹立たしい。
リトルアラミゴの現状は、
陸路による東方貿易を放棄した奴の責任もあるではないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200400_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>That you should have traveled so far, under such dire circumstances, only to be refused in this manner is utterly unconscionable. Pray accept my sincerest apologies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200400_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>はるか遠方から必死の思いで来たのだ。
なんとかしてやりたいのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200410_RAUBAHN<tab>Now that the Empire no longer poses an immediate threat, they see little reason to maintain the pretense of unity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200410_RAUBAHN<tab>ようやく、グランドカンパニーを軌道に乗せたというのに、
この国は未だひとつになり切れてはおらん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200420_RAUBAHN<tab>The Monetarists have grown especially defiant of late─Lord Lolorito most of all.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200420_RAUBAHN<tab>共和派……いや、ロロリトが力を持ちすぎている。
このままではいずれ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200430_RAUBAHN<tab>But this is neither the time nor place for that discussion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_200430_RAUBAHN<tab>すまない、内輪の話だな。
一旦、外に出るとしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300010_THANCRED<tab>How goes the fishing? Caught anything slippery?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300010_THANCRED<tab>どうだ、足取りはつかめたか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. Our suspicions were well founded. The Serpent Reavers are indeed the culprits.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300020_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、思ったとおり。
犯人は海賊団「海蛇の舌」の連中ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300030_THANCRED<tab>The plot thickens...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300030_THANCRED<tab>……やはりそうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>Has there been any movement in Thanalan?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300040_YSHTOLA<tab>こっちに何か動きはあった？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300050_THANCRED<tab>It has been blessedly quiet. Which is to say the Amalj'aa are being no more or less of a nuisance than usual, summoning Ifrit with such crystals as they have hoarded.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300050_THANCRED<tab>いや、静かなものさ。
アマルジャ族は、時折「イフリート」を召喚しているが、
溜め込んでいたクリスタルを使っているようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300060_THANCRED<tab>Urianger, too, reports naught out of the ordinary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300060_THANCRED<tab>ウリエンジェからも、目立った動きは報告されてない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>Then we have our explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300070_YSHTOLA<tab>……決まりね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300080_MINFILIA<tab>Your explanation for what, pray tell?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300080_MINFILIA<tab>どういうこと？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>For the recent spate of crystal thefts in Thanalan. We naturally assumed that the trail would lead us back to the Amalj'aa.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300090_YSHTOLA<tab>ここ最近、頻発していた、
ザナラーンのクリスタルの消失……。
当初は、アマルジャ族に流れていると思っていたわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>Yet it did not. It led us across the sea unto Vylbrand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300100_YSHTOLA<tab>でも、実際には、流れていた先は海の向こう……
バイルブランド島だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300110_MINFILIA<tab>Vylbrand...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300110_MINFILIA<tab>ラノシアに……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300120_MINFILIA<tab>There <var 1A 02 /var>have<var 1A 01 /var> been reports of increased Sahagin activity of late...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300120_MINFILIA<tab>確かに、しばらくおとなしかったサハギン族が、
ここにきて活発に動いているという情報があるけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300130_MINFILIA<tab>Oh gods...they mean to summon Leviathan?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300130_MINFILIA<tab>……まさか、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」を
召喚しようとしているの！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>That is the way of it, I fear.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300140_YSHTOLA<tab>残念だけど、そのとおりよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300150_YSHTOLA<tab>Whilst conducting our investigation on behalf of the Mineral Concern, we came upon evidence implicating the Serpent Reavers.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300150_YSHTOLA<tab>先のアマジナ鉱山社の事件を追ううちに、
海賊の関連を匂わせる証拠を見つけたの。
そこで、私はリムサ・ロミンサに行って調査をしていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300160_YSHTOLA<tab>With the aid of the Maelstrom, I was able to verify our suspicions. 'Tis only a matter of time before Leviathan returns to harrow the seas.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300160_YSHTOLA<tab>「黒渦団」の調査隊に同行した結果……
サハギン族による蛮神「リヴァイアサン」の召喚は、
目前に迫っているとの結論に達したわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>But there is more. One of the Sahagin─an elder, by my judgment─spoke of attaining the “gift and knowledge of eternity.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300170_YSHTOLA<tab>……そして、やつらは「不滅なる者」という、
何かしらの力を手に入れている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300180_MINFILIA<tab><moan>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_300180_MINFILIA<tab>……クッ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400010_YSHTOLA<tab>Such a disturbance in the aether... If I did not know better, I should think this device defective.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400010_YSHTOLA<tab>このエーテルの乱れ……。
想像以上ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400020_YSHTOLA<tab>And there is the explanation...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400020_YSHTOLA<tab>……やはり、神降ろしの準備を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400030_WUUR<tab>Soon! Sssoon it shall begin! Our Lord shall rise 'midst sssurging waves to wash away the finless ones!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400030_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ……。
すべての準備は整った！
ワレらが神を招き「ヒレナシ」どもを一掃する！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400040_WUUR<tab>And I shall be granted the gift and knowledge of eternity, and with the emissary ssstand equal! Then shall I know no cesssation, no oblivion!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400040_WUUR<tab>そして、この力を解き放って「不滅なる者」へと昇華し、
あの方と同じ、永遠なる時を手に入れる……！
……ワレらの海を取り戻す時が来たのだ、フスィーッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>...Whence comes this promise of immortality? The emissary?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400050_YSHTOLA<tab>あの方……？
不滅なる者とはいったい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400060_YSHTOLA<tab>We have outstayed our welcome.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_400060_YSHTOLA<tab>ここまでか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500010_MINFILIA<tab>“The gift...and knowledge.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500010_MINFILIA<tab>不滅なる者……。
まさか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>Are the two of you quite well?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500020_YSHTOLA<tab>ふたりとも大丈夫？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500030_MINFILIA<tab>You...you shared that vision, did you not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500030_MINFILIA<tab>……今、あなたも見たのね！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500040_MINFILIA<tab>Even before the Sahagin made mention of the emissary, I recognized Elidibus's words. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> is behind this.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500040_MINFILIA<tab>不滅なる者、永遠の時……つまりは「不死」の存在……。
おそらく、白き衣のアシエン……
「アシエン・エリディブス」が言っていたことよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500050_MINFILIA<tab>But surely it is not within his power to grant the Echo?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500050_MINFILIA<tab>……だとしたら、あのサハギン族は、
「超える力」を持っているというの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500060_YSHTOLA<tab>My lady─unless we act swiftly, Leviathan will rise again. The Admiral has already requested that we intervene to prevent this. Failing that, we are to attend to the primal's extermination.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500060_YSHTOLA<tab>メルウィブ提督から、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」召喚の阻止、
それに、万が一の事態に備えて、
「暁」の力を借りたいと申し出があったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500070_MINFILIA<tab>She will have our full cooperation. Let us make haste to Limsa Lominsa.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500070_MINFILIA<tab>蛮神問題となれば、断る理由はありません。
リムサ・ロミンサへ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500080_MINFILIA<tab>I mean to play a part in this mission. Tataru─pray take charge in my absence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500080_MINFILIA<tab>わたしも行きます。
……タタルさん、留守をお願いね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500090_THANCRED<tab>My lady, are you sure this is wise?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500090_THANCRED<tab>おいおい、本気かミンフィリア。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500100_MINFILIA<tab>I am aware of the risks. But there is something I must see with mine own eyes.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500100_MINFILIA<tab>どうしても、確かめなくてはならないことがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500110_MINFILIA<tab>...The true nature of the Echo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500110_MINFILIA<tab>「答え」があるのかもしれない……。
……「超える力」の真なる能力の。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500120_THANCRED<tab>Very well. I shall not stand in your way...on the condition that you permit me to accompany you as bodyguard.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500120_THANCRED<tab>しかたない、俺も行こう。
もしもの時には、盟主さまは俺が守るさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500130_MINFILIA<tab>Your company is ever welcome, Thancred.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500130_MINFILIA<tab>ありがとう、サンクレッド……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500140_YUGIRI<tab>I take it something ill is afoot?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500140_YUGIRI<tab>……何か、起きたようだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500150_YSHTOLA<tab>Aye. A primal is about to be loosed upon Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500150_YSHTOLA<tab>ええ、エオルゼアを脅かしている仇敵……
蛮神が現れようとしているのよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500160_YUGIRI<tab>A...primal?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500160_YUGIRI<tab>蛮神……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500170_YSHTOLA<tab>A godlike being whose very existence is a bane upon the land. We Scions of the Seventh Dawn are sworn to put an end to their kind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500170_YSHTOLA<tab>私たち「暁の血盟」は、
その敵を排除するために動いている。
この地を救済するためにね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500180_YUGIRI<tab>I see. Know then that I am learned in the arts of war. In return for the kindness you have shown my people, I would lend you my blade.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500180_YUGIRI<tab>……ならば、私も力を貸そう。
皆には世話になっている……少しでも恩を返したい。
幸い、腕には少し自信がある。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500190_YSHTOLA<tab>It would be most welcome. When contending with a primal, one can never have too many able allies.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500190_YSHTOLA<tab>それは助かるわ。
私たちには、少しでも戦力が必要なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500200_YSHTOLA<tab>If you crave a more intimate understanding of the problems facing Eorzea, this experience is like to provide it. Be sure to come well prepared.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_500200_YSHTOLA<tab>それに、あなたにとっても、
エオルゼアがかかえる問題を知る、
良い機会になるかもしれないわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600010_YSHTOLA<tab>Damn them... They have made thralls of soldiers and civilians both...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600010_YSHTOLA<tab>チッ……民間人に黒渦団のッ！？
誘拐してテンパードにしたのね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600030_THANCRED<tab>Did I miss much?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600030_THANCRED<tab>またせたな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600040_YUGIRI<tab>Hah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600040_YUGIRI<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600050_YUGIRI<tab>Yah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600050_YUGIRI<tab>タッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600060_THANCRED<tab>So that is how you fight in the Far East? Mental note: pick no quarrel with Domans.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600060_THANCRED<tab>東方の戦闘術ってやつかい？
やるじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600070_THANCRED<tab>But seriously: if I am to keep up, I must needs forsake elegance for efficiency.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600070_THANCRED<tab>なら、俺も……。
お上品に戦うのはここまでだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600080_THANCRED<tab>Yah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600080_THANCRED<tab>フッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600090_THANCRED<tab>Hah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600090_THANCRED<tab>ハッ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600100_YUGIRI<tab>Hmmm...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600100_YUGIRI<tab>ほう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600110_THANCRED<tab>To the aetheryte!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_600110_THANCRED<tab>蛮風エーテライトへ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700010_MERLWYB<tab>You'll forgive me my lateness.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700010_MERLWYB<tab>遅れてすまない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700020_THANCRED<tab>I've been something of a liability of late, I know. 'Tis high time I set about making amends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700020_THANCRED<tab>散々迷惑をかけてきたんだ。
たまには、かっこいいところをみせないとな！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700030_WUUR<tab>Pshhh! Long have you shriveled shhhorewalkers tormented our kind!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700030_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ……。
ワレらから海を奪った「ヒレナシ」どもめ！
性懲りもなく現れおったか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700040_WUUR<tab>But no more! Your time is at an end!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700040_WUUR<tab>しかし、その愚行も今日までよ！
貴様ら「ヒレナシ」を撃滅する時がきたのだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700050_WUUR<tab>You shall perish with sssalt in your wounds and sssea in your lungs!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700050_WUUR<tab>今再び、ワレらが水神様を招き、
その水流により「ヒレナシ」どもを押し流してくれる！
フスィーッ！！

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700060_WUUR<tab>Lord of the Whorl, hearken to our plea!
Lord of the Whorl, deliver us from our misery!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700060_WUUR<tab>御神よ、ワレらが誓願を届け給え……。
御神よ、ワレらの祈願を叶え給え……。
御神よ、ワレらに慈悲を与え給え……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700070_MERLWYB<tab>Do you feel that!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700070_MERLWYB<tab>何をする気だ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700080_MINFILIA<tab>I know this sensation... It's the Echo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700080_MINFILIA<tab>この感覚……まさか「超える力」ッ！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700090_MERLWYB<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700090_MERLWYB<tab>なに！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700100_WUUR<tab>Pshhh! Sssuch power! It is...<var 1A 02 /var>transcendent<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700100_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ！！
そうか……これが「超える力」を受け入れるということか！
フスィーッ、これでワレもあの方々と同じ存在に……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700110_MERLWYB<tab>Seven hells...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700110_MERLWYB<tab>なんだと！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700120_WUUR<tab>Pshhhahahahahaaa! Ssstrike me down if you will! It is futile! I have massstered the gift! I am...<var 1A 02 /var>eternal<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700120_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ、無駄だ！
ワレは「不滅なる者」に昇華した！
もはや止めることはできんぞ「ヒレナシ」ども！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700130_WUUR<tab>O mighty Leviathan, ruler of the ssseas, born of waters primordial! I offer unto You this frail fleshhh, that You might grant Your faithful servants deliverance!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700130_WUUR<tab>創世の湧水に生まれし、蒼き神よ！
氣現にて穢れた大地を清めんとする、いと高き神よ！
今こそ、ワレの肉体を依代に、一族に救いを！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700140_WUUR<tab>I beseech You! Come forth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700140_WUUR<tab>水神リヴァイアサンよ、来たりませ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700150_MERLWYB<tab>Die, damn you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700150_MERLWYB<tab>クソッタレ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700160_WUUR<tab>Foolishhh shorewalker! You cannot kill that which is eternal!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700160_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ……。
無駄だと言っただろう「ヒレナシ」めぇ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700170_YUGIRI<tab>Heavens forfend...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700170_YUGIRI<tab>こ、これは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700180_MERLWYB<tab>Damn it all!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700180_MERLWYB<tab>蛮神「リヴァイアサン」ッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700190_WUUR<tab>Pshhh!? My being...ebbs away... B-But it should by rightsss be infinite!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700190_WUUR<tab>フスィーッ……！？
……力が……抜けて……
水神様に……吸われている……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700200_WUUR<tab>Am I not...immortal? Curse you, Emissary! You promised me...everlasssting... Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700200_WUUR<tab>ワレは……不滅になったのでは……ないのか……？
…………白き衣のものよ……これは……いったい！？
……フ……スィーッ……………………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700210_MINFILIA<tab>Wh-Where did he go!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700210_MINFILIA<tab>……消えた！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700220_MERLWYB<tab>What say you? Nary a single ship!? Hells take that sea demon!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700220_MERLWYB<tab>……艦隊が壊滅したとは、どういうことだ！？
リヴァイアサンがそちらに出現しただと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700230_MERLWYB<tab>Gather the survivors and get to shore. Leave the wrecks for the pirates.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700230_MERLWYB<tab>わかった、残存艦を編成して撤退しろ！
……かまわん、餌は海賊どもにくれてやれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700240_MERLWYB<tab>Leviathan wastes no time. The diversionary squadron is lost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700240_MERLWYB<tab>海洋で陽動作戦にあたっていた黒渦艦隊が、
蛮神「リヴァイアサン」に襲われ、大打撃を被ったらしい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700250_MERLWYB<tab>For a mercy, 'twould seem the primal now makes for open sea. But why does he not press his advantage? Unless...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700250_MERLWYB<tab>リヴァイアサンは、西ラノシア沖に移動した……。
なぜだ……？
なぜ、ここではなく沖に出たのだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700260_MERLWYB<tab>Gods save us, he means to unleash a tidal wave!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_700260_MERLWYB<tab>まさか……！？
「大海嘯（だいかいしょう）」を起こすつもりか！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800010_MERLWYB<tab>There used to be a hamlet beyond South Tidegate in western La Noscea. Halfstone, 'twas called.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800010_MERLWYB<tab>西ラノシアの南北防波壁の先……。
あの辺りは、以前「ハーフストーン」と呼ばれ、
小さな入植地が存在していた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800020_MERLWYB<tab>Some years prior to the Maelstrom's founding, Leviathan rose from the briny depths, and set about unleashing watery hell upon us. On that occasion, the Company of Heroes put him down before he could do too much damage.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800020_MERLWYB<tab>……黒渦団が設立される数年前、
蛮神「リヴァイアサン」が召喚されたことがあった。
その時は「海雄旅団」が討伐に成功したのだが……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800030_MERLWYB<tab>But when the bastard came next, this time in the wake of the Calamity, we were not so fortunate. Weary of ravaging our shoreline, he summoned a tidal wave which fair leveled Halfstone, and washed the soil away for good measure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800030_MERLWYB<tab>霊災直後に再召喚された際には、
蛮神の放った「大海嘯」の影響で、その入植地は全滅……。
土は剥ぎ取られ、岩だらけの不毛の土地と化した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>The area was subsequently occupied by the Sahagin.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800040_YSHTOLA<tab>それが、今の「サプサ産卵地」と呼ばれている場所。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800050_MERLWYB<tab>Aye, the thrice-damned creatures transformed it into a spawning ground for their brood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800050_MERLWYB<tab>……そうだ。
サハギン族は地形を作り替え、
大規模な産卵地を作ろうとしている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800060_MERLWYB<tab>Given the quantity of crystals stolen to feed him and his legion of thralls, we can be fairly sure that Leviathan is stronger now than in his previous incarnations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800060_MERLWYB<tab>流入していたクリスタル、テンパードの数からみるに、
今回召喚された蛮神「リヴァイアサン」は、
先のものとは比較にならないくらい強力だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800070_MERLWYB<tab>If that sea demon is left to wreak havoc, what befell Halfstone may well befall a larger settlement─even Limsa.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800070_MERLWYB<tab>本格的に力をつけた奴が「大海嘯」を使えば、
ハーフストーンのような一地方だけではなく、
リムサ・ロミンサ全体が海に沈められかねない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800080_MERLWYB<tab>That <var 1A 02 /var>cannot<var 1A 01 /var> happen. The primal must be stopped.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800080_MERLWYB<tab>なんとしても、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」を
討伐しなくてはならないが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800090_THANCRED<tab>That was ever our objective, Admiral. But how are we to achieve it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800090_THANCRED<tab>しかし、メルウィブ提督。
どう対処します？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800100_THANCRED<tab>The sea is Leviathan's uncontested domain. The ships of the Third Squadron could not close to within a hundred yalms of the primal, nor could their cannons pierce his defenses.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800100_THANCRED<tab>海はリヴァイアサンの独壇場だ。
第三艦隊の船だって、近づく前に、
沈められたというではないですか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800110_MERLWYB<tab>I have read the reports, Master Thancred. Our warships may as well have been bloody pleasure barges for all the good they did. Seven hells... Is there no way that we might strike back?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800110_MERLWYB<tab>加えて、砲撃も着弾前に撃ち落とされ、
効果が無いとの報告も受けている。
何か打つ手はないのか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800120_YSHTOLA<tab>The Company of Heroes defeated Leviathan having first lured him into an inlet, but we must needs contend with him upon the open sea. It will avail us little to consult past experience.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800120_YSHTOLA<tab>唯一の討伐事例では、入江に誘き寄せて戦ったというわ。
……となると、元「海雄旅団」の人たちに話を聞いても、
有益な情報は得られないでしょうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Admiral, if I may.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800130_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>……提督。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800140_MERLWYB<tab>Speak freely, Marshal.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800140_MERLWYB<tab>言ってみろ、エインザル大甲将。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800150_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>By all accounts, Leviathan's most formidable weapon is the very sea itself. Waves and whirlpools, tides and currents─all these things are his to command. The key to victory, I believe, lies in disarming our foe.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800150_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>帰還した生存艦からの報告によれば、
蛮神「リヴァイアサン」からの攻撃は、水神の名のごとく、
大波……つまり「水」を操ったものだといいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800160_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>This, in effect, is what the Company of Heroes achieved with their ruse. We cannot lure Leviathan from the sea a second time, but what if we could weaken his hold upon the element of water? I have heard of devices capable of such wonders. They draw upon the power of corrupted crystals, I am told.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800160_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>ならば、その莫大な水属性の力を、
ほかの属性に変換して衝撃を和らげればいい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800170_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>If mounted upon a ship, such a device might be used to prevent Leviathan from bringing the full force of the sea to bear against us, rendering him no more dangerous than any other sea serpent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800170_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>「偏属性クリスタル」を用いた属性変換機構、
「魔法障壁発動器」を船に乗せて、身を守るって訳ですな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800180_MINFILIA<tab>Of course... Cid built a similar device to grant the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> safe passage through Garuda's tempest, did he not?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800180_MINFILIA<tab>あなたが蛮神「ガルーダ」の暴風の壁を突破した時と、
同じ手法をとるというわけね。
アルフィノからの報告書には目を通したわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800190_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Begging your pardon, my lady, but to give credit where it's due, this is something I heard from an old arcanist friend of mine.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800190_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>まぁ、古い知人の……
風来坊な巴術士からの入れ知恵だがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800200_MERLWYB<tab>It makes little difference who thought of it first, so long as it works. Beg the specifications of this device from your friend, and I shall pass them on to our people at Naldiq & Vymelli's.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800200_MERLWYB<tab>なるほど……。
確かに、同じ機構を作るのであれば、シドでなくても、
ナルディク＆ヴィメリー社で作ることができるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800210_MERLWYB<tab>But before we proceed any further, I would voice one concern: piercing Garuda's defenses is one thing, suppressing Leviathan's attacks quite another.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800210_MERLWYB<tab>ただし、あくまで「対防御」の策であった、
蛮神「ガルーダ」の時とは状況が異なる……。
今回は「対攻撃」なのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800220_MERLWYB<tab>In matters of science, I am as a babbling babe, but I cannot well imagine that such a feat would be possible without a veritable mountain of corrupted crystals.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800220_MERLWYB<tab>蛮神が大型船を沈めるために繰り出す大波……
それを変換しきるために必要な
偏属性クリスタルの量となると、想像を絶するな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800230_MERLWYB<tab>The question being: do we have a ship big enough to bear such a burden?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800230_MERLWYB<tab>それだけ莫大な量のクリスタルを積んで、
まともに航行可能な大型船など、黒渦団にも無いぞ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800240_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Mayhap not, Admiral. But two might. Recall you the tale of Mistbeard's greatest haul? It is said that he lashed two ships together, side by side, the better to bear his plunder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800240_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>……かつて、リムサ・ロミンサで勢力を誇った
海賊の「霧髭」は、奪った大量の財宝を運ぶために、
2隻の廃船をつなぎ合わせた「双胴船」を造ったといいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800250_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>By your leave, we might attempt to repeat the trick. The gods know, it would be quicker than building a new vessel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800250_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>残った軍艦を繋いで「双胴船」を再現。
大型の属性変換機構を積載すれば、あるいは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800260_MERLWYB<tab>Mistbeard did this? Truly, Marshal, upon the subject of the pirate king, you are as a scholar.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800260_MERLWYB<tab>「霧髭」がそんなことを……？
さすがに詳しいな、エインザル大甲将。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800270_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Now, from what I have gleaned of these matters, the device will need to be in close and constant proximity to the target. To wit, we must lash our twin vessel to Leviathan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800270_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>ゴホン……ともかく、戦艦で急造の「双胴船」を牽引。
目標の目前で切り離し、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」にぶつける。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800280_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>This in itself will be no small feat. Ramming speed will be required, but given the weight of the cargo, that will only be attainable with the aid of a towing vessel...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800280_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>奴に取りつくことさえできれば、勝機はあるはずです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800290_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>Suffice it to say, the task of piloting said vessel will entail considerable danger, and I would not ask it of another. I volunteer myself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800290_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>むろん、発案者であるからには、
危険な牽引船の指揮は、自分がとらせてもらいますよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800300_MERLWYB<tab>'Twill be dangerous for all involved...but we have no better recourse. Very well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800300_MERLWYB<tab>お前たち……。
……そうだな、その作戦しかあるまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800310_MERLWYB<tab>Commodore. Assemble the remnants of the fleet at Moraby Bay.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800310_MERLWYB<tab>レイナーか、私だ。
モラビー湾に、残った軍艦をかき集めろ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800320_MERLWYB<tab>Give priority to our soundest vessels. The repairs can wait.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800320_MERLWYB<tab>……そうだ、生きている艦を優先してまわせ。
修理はあとにまわしてかまわん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800330_MERLWYB<tab>Storm Marshal Slafyrsyn, command of the operation is yours. I want that twin vessel ready to sail posthaste.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800330_MERLWYB<tab>エインザル・スラフィルシン大甲将、
本作戦の指揮をお前に任せる。
至急、「双胴船」の製造にかかれ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800340_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>At once, Admiral!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800340_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN<tab>ハッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800350_MERLWYB<tab>And then there is the small matter of slaying the beast... The fate of Limsa Lominsa rests upon your shoulders once again. Go well, Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_800350_MERLWYB<tab>リムサ・ロミンサの未来は貴公にかかっている。
……頼んだぞ、光の戦士よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900010_MERLWYB<tab>We Lominsans are sworn to strive “Till sea swallows all”─and swallow all it would have, had Leviathan prevailed. That we still strive now, we owe in no small part to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900010_MERLWYB<tab>蛮神「リヴァイアサン」の討伐、ご苦労だった。
貴公のおかげで、「大海嘯」を未然に防ぐことができたぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900020_MERLWYB<tab>Not for the first time, you have delivered Limsa Lominsa from the wrath of a primal. Never has our nation known a stouter ally.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900020_MERLWYB<tab>蛮神「タイタン」に引き続き、またも助けられたな。
まったく大したものだよ。
冒険者にしておくのは惜しいくらいだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900030_MERLWYB<tab>On behalf of my people, I give you my humblest thanks.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900030_MERLWYB<tab>リムサ・ロミンサの代表として礼を言う。
感謝するぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900040_MERLWYB<tab>'Tis meet that I give thanks to old Mistbeard, too, for his fine solution. Whatever else he may have been, 'tis clear he was a resourceful soul. Would that I had a man like him in my service.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900040_MERLWYB<tab>しかし、あのような戦術があったとはな。
黒渦艦隊の編成を、今一度見直すべきかもしれん。
……どこかの、「霧髭に妙に詳しい男」のおかげだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900050_YUGIRI<tab>Before I set foot in these lands, I had no inkling that the people of Eorzea contended with such mighty foes. Suffice it to say, their existence came as something of a shock─as did the idea that they could be defeated.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900050_YUGIRI<tab>蛮神といったか……。
エオルゼアの民が、まさか、あのように強大な魔物と
戦っているとは思いもよらなかった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900060_YUGIRI<tab>This experience has served to remind me of the vastness of the world...and the boundless potential of man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900060_YUGIRI<tab>そして、それを討伐せし冒険者の力。
実に見事だった……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900070_YUGIRI<tab>Though I am but a refugee in this realm, I would fain be of use to you in your fight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900070_YUGIRI<tab>ドマの難民である自分に協力できることは少ないが、
この地に、我らの戦闘術を伝授したいと思う。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900080_YUGIRI<tab>Know that I am tutored in one of the foremost combat arts of the Far East. It may seem...outlandish to the Eorzean eye, but should any of your people care to learn, I would be pleased to initiate them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900080_YUGIRI<tab>少しばかりクセのある戦い方だが……。
エオルゼアに生きる冒険者になら、
きっと使いこなせるだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900090_MERLWYB<tab>And I will see to it that they are grateful. I have no doubt that your knowledge and skills will serve us well.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900090_MERLWYB<tab>それは、ありがたい申し出だ。
この先の戦いで、きっと役に立つだろう！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900100_MERLWYB<tab>Besides, your art is not so outlandish as you think. Would you not agree, Master Thancred?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900100_MERLWYB<tab>それに、クセのある戦い方と言ったが、
あれに近い戦闘術を持つ者たちを知っている。
……そうであろう？　サンクレッド殿。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900110_THANCRED<tab>Naught escapes your searching eye, Admiral.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900110_THANCRED<tab>やれやれ、提督殿は何でもお見通しのようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900120_THANCRED<tab>Few are privy to this information, but Limsa Lominsa is home to a certain...secret fraternity. Its members are trained in a form of combat not unlike your own.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900120_THANCRED<tab>このリムサ・ロミンサには、
これまで表に出てはいない「地下組織」がある。
……海都の暗部で活躍している組織でね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900130_THANCRED<tab>By my judgment, it should not be beyond such individuals to adapt to the techniques I witnessed you employing with such admirable deftness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900130_THANCRED<tab>そこに伝わる戦い方に、君の技は似ているのさ。
うまく融合できれば、新しい戦闘術になるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900140_YUGIRI<tab>I am heartened to hear this. I, too, noted a kinship between your style and mine own. Though it seemed to me that you fought differently in the beginning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900140_YUGIRI<tab>貴殿の戦いぶり、私も共通点を感じていたのだ。
なるほど、面白い戦闘術になるかもしれないな。
……しかし、直前まで見せていた技とは違うようだが？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900150_THANCRED<tab>A-Aye, I suppose I did... What can I say? I am a man of many talents. Hahaha...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900150_THANCRED<tab>……それはだな。
い、いろいろと理由があるんだよ、ははは。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900160_YSHTOLA<tab>Though you may labor to believe it, Thancred was once something of a scoundrel, who fraternized with the criminal class in these parts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900160_YSHTOLA<tab>実はね……。
サンクレッドは昔、この街でコソ泥をやっていたのよ。
その時の繋がりで、ここの地下組織とも縁があるってわけ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900170_THANCRED<tab>Y-Y'shtola! You jest, of course!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900170_THANCRED<tab>ま、待て、ヤ・シュトラ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900180_MINFILIA<tab>But for a chance encounter with Alphinaud's grandsire, he might never have left Limsa Lominsa; or received an education in Sharlayan; or taken up his post in Ul'dah─which is where he trained in the blade, lest you wonder.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900180_MINFILIA<tab>その後、師であるルイゾワ様に拾われて、無事に更生。
コソ泥から足を洗って、
ウルダハで剣術を身につけたのよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900190_THANCRED<tab>Minfilia─please!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900190_THANCRED<tab>おおお、ミンフィリアまで……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900200_YUGIRI<tab>It would seem there is more to you than meets the eye, Master Thancred.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900200_YUGIRI<tab>フフフ、本性を隠していたってわけか。
面白い男だな、サンクレッド殿は。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900210_MERLWYB<tab>Lady Yugiri─I am told that you and yours came to Eorzea seeking permanent resettlement, and that many Domans have since been engaged as frontier hands at Revenant's Toll. Mor Dhona is many things, but a place of refuge it is not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900210_MERLWYB<tab>聞けば、貴公は東方からエオルゼアに逃れてきたらしいな。
今はレヴナンツトールの開拓団に加わっているとか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900220_MERLWYB<tab>Know that I would like nothing better than to furnish your people with a new home here on Lominsan soil. Alas, racked by instability as we are, our nation is in no fit state to take you in.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900220_MERLWYB<tab>リムサ・ロミンサは様々な問題を抱え、
貴公らを受け入れることはできない状態だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900230_MERLWYB<tab>Yet I'll not have it said that we turned a blind eye to your suffering. Until such time as we can do more, I pledge to send provisions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900230_MERLWYB<tab>しかし、物資を贈ることはできる。
今回の礼も兼ねて、
レヴナンツトールに支援させていただこう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900240_YUGIRI<tab>We are in your debt, Admiral. I realize that it scarce qualifies as repayment, but if it please you, I shall set about sharing my martial knowledge with your people at once.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900240_YUGIRI<tab>ありがとうございます、メルウィブ提督。
準備に時間がかかるやもしれませんが、
きっと、我々の戦闘術を根付かせてみせましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900250_MERLWYB<tab>You wished a word in private.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900250_MERLWYB<tab>……話とは何だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900260_YSHTOLA<tab>The better not to spoil the festive mood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900260_YSHTOLA<tab>今回の件……。
また、あの時と同じね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900270_YSHTOLA<tab>History repeats itself, Admiral. As the kobolds did before them, the Sahagin resorted to summoning their god over a territorial feud. They acted in self-preservation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900270_YSHTOLA<tab>コボルド族も、サハギン族も、蛮神を召喚したのは、
バイルブランド島を巡り、人と争うからよ。
……自分たちの居場所を得るために。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900280_YSHTOLA<tab>It may be that the Sahagin initiated this particular clash, but how it begins does not interest me so much as how it ends.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900280_YSHTOLA<tab>今回は、サハギン族が、
リムサ・ロミンサの民から領土を奪おうとした……。
だけど、問題の本質はどちらも同じだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900290_MERLWYB<tab>I have not forgotten our conversation, Y'shtola. I am aware that man bears part of the blame for the primals' existence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900290_MERLWYB<tab>ああ、わかっているとも……。
蛮神問題は、人が引き起こしている問題でもあろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900300_MERLWYB<tab>Nor am I ignorant of the Sahagin's reason for acting. They sought to secure a place to breed and multiply, that their kind might survive. Self-preservation, as you say.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900300_MERLWYB<tab>お前の言うとおり、
奴らは「産卵地」を得るという目的のため、
まさに生きるために戦い、土地を得ようとしている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900310_MERLWYB<tab>But we have as much right to live and thrive as they. If our own survival is threatened, are we to lay down our arms and welcome oblivion? Nay.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900310_MERLWYB<tab>……しかし、人もまた、生き残るために精一杯なのだ。
コボルド族とサハギン族の、
どちらに負けるわけにもいかん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900320_YSHTOLA<tab>And so you kill, that you might live. Yet if living is a right, then that right belongs to all peoples, be they men or beastmen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900320_YSHTOLA<tab>生き残るために、殺し合う……。
生きることが正義というなら、すべての民に正義はある。
ならば、いったい誰が悪だというのかしらね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900330_MERLWYB<tab>I'll not deny your reasoning. But when a storm gathers, it falls to me to see my people safely through it. That is my duty, and I shall do it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900330_MERLWYB<tab>これを主我と言われれば、それまでかもしれん。
……だが、今はそれが正義と信じるしかない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900340_YSHTOLA<tab>As must we all, Admiral. Stay the course, then, but know that it will lead to no good end.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900340_YSHTOLA<tab>何が正しいのかわからないのなら、
自分たちの正義を信じればいい。
……いえ、信じるしかないのね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900350_YUGIRI<tab>Man has ever put himself first and foremost.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900350_YUGIRI<tab>自分たちの行いこそが正義と信じる……。
人は世界中どこでも同じなのだな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900360_YUGIRI<tab>To justify his actions, he clads himself in the armor of righteousness─though it be a fancy of his own making. In this, mayhap the Garleans and we Domans are not so different...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900360_YUGIRI<tab>人は、自分の行いに意味を持たねば、
生きていくことはできない。
そういう観点では、帝国もドマも同じかもしれないな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900370_MERLWYB<tab>Eorzea has become as a raging sea. If we are to keep our heads above the waves, we cannot scruple to drown the man next to us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900370_MERLWYB<tab>今やエオルゼアは「混沌の渦動」……その中心だ。
だからこそ人は、荒れ狂う波間の中で航路を拓くために争う。
……例え、その行いが他者の正義とぶつかったとしても、な。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900380_MERLWYB<tab>When hopes of coexistence founder, strength must determine who has the greater right to live.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_900380_MERLWYB<tab>自分が生きていくための行い。
自分の居場所をみつけるための争い。
自分を存在させるための正義……か。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00010_MINFILIA<tab>I have been reflecting upon the events which took place during our visit to Vylbrand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00010_MINFILIA<tab>少し、いいかしら。
……あなたに、聞いておいてほしいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00020_MINFILIA<tab>If you have a moment, I would share my conclusions with you. Please bear with me.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00020_MINFILIA<tab>リムサ・ロミンサに行ってから、
ずっと考えていたことがあるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00030_MINFILIA<tab>When the Sahagin elder summoned Leviathan, he employed the power we have come to know as the Echo.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00030_MINFILIA<tab>蛮神「リヴァイアサン」が召喚される際、
あの長老と思われるサハギン族は「超える力」を行使した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00040_MINFILIA<tab>Though I cannot well explain the how of it, it would seem he became immortal in so doing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00040_MINFILIA<tab>そして、「超える力」を受け入れたことで、
一時的にとはいえ、確かに「不死」となった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00050_MINFILIA<tab>When the Admiral subsequently slew him, his spirit emerged from his lifeless flesh, a consciousness shorn of physical form.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00050_MINFILIA<tab>古い伝承には、霊災の度に転生して生まれ変わり、
困難に立ち向かう魂があるというわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00060_MINFILIA<tab>Thus transfigured, he took up residence in the body of his minion with the ease of a man donning a favorite glove.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00060_MINFILIA<tab>私は、この伝承にある「転生する魂」こそが、
「超える力」の正体なんじゃないか……
そんな風に考えています。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00070_MINFILIA<tab>Long have I known that the Echo allows one to pass through the walls of a man's soul.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00070_MINFILIA<tab>今回の一件で、ますますその想いは強くなったわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00080_MINFILIA<tab>But never did I imagine that it could free us from our own flesh, nor less that our souls could then occupy the next corporeal vessel to take our fancy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00080_MINFILIA<tab>次々と肉体を入れ替える、魂だけの存在……
まるで、任意に転生を繰り返しているようなものだもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00090_MINFILIA<tab>It was of this that Elidibus spoke─an existence which knows neither cessation nor oblivion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00090_MINFILIA<tab>この伝承が真実とするならば、
「超える力」の真実にも、辿り着けるかもしれない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00100_MINFILIA<tab>And yet, though the Sahagin had mastered his gift and thereby become immortal, he was by no means invulnerable.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00100_MINFILIA<tab>「超える力」の能力は、言葉、心、時間などの壁を超え、
相手を「視る」ことができるというもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00110_MINFILIA<tab>As we both bore witness, he was ultimately absorbed into Leviathan.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00110_MINFILIA<tab>これまで、あなたが体験したように、
立ち塞がる「精神の壁」を超えることができる能力ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00120_MINFILIA<tab>And the import of this observation? If the Ascians' mode of existence is indeed the same, it can be inferred that they, too, are not invulnerable─that they <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> be destroyed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00120_MINFILIA<tab>では、伝承による「転生」とは何なのかしら？
……例えばそれが、今回サハギン族がみせたような、
「肉体」への転移を指していたとしたら。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00130_MINFILIA<tab>There exists a legend which tells of souls who are reborn upon the cusp of each Umbral Calamity, that they might stay the encroaching Darkness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00130_MINFILIA<tab>つまり「超える力」の最大の能力が、「肉体の壁」を超え、
魂だけの存在になることなのだとしたら……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00140_MINFILIA<tab>To most, it is but a faerie tale, yet recent events have given me cause to wonder: could the legend in fact refer to the Echo?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00140_MINFILIA<tab>アシエン・エリディブスが言っていたとおり、
「不死」の存在となるかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00150_MINFILIA<tab>Much and more yet remains unknown, but I am confident that all will become clear in time.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00150_MINFILIA<tab>でも、アシエンと同じ「不滅なる者」となったはずの
サハギン族は、蛮神「リヴァイアサン」が顕現する際の
エーテル消耗によって、蛮神に吸収されてしまった……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00160_MINFILIA<tab>For the present, however, what matters is that the key to defeating the Ascians may at last be within sight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00160_MINFILIA<tab>……そう、不滅なる者は、決して「不死」ではない。
ここに、アシエン消滅の手掛かりがあるはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00170_MINFILIA<tab>With Urianger's aid, it is my hope that I shall fathom this matter ere long.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00170_MINFILIA<tab>「超える力」の能力と、アシエン消滅の方法……。
わたしは、引き続きウリエンジェさんと
この件を追ってみます。

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00180_MINFILIA<tab>Ah! I was just about to send for you, my friend.
...Is aught amiss?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00180_MINFILIA<tab>あら、ウリエンジェさん。
ちょうどいいところに……。
…………どうかしたの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00190_URIANGER<tab>Grave tidings from the Sharlayan motherland, my lady.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00190_URIANGER<tab>大変です、ミンフィリア。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00200_URIANGER<tab>It doth concern our distant allies, the Students of Baldesion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00200_URIANGER<tab>連絡が途絶えたバルデシオン委員会を
シャーレアン本国を経由して、調査していたのですが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00210_MINFILIA<tab>What of them?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00210_MINFILIA<tab>……何があったの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00220_URIANGER<tab>My lady...the Isle of Val, which for many years hath been the order's home, is no more.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00220_URIANGER<tab>委員会の本部があるバル島が、
海洋から完全に消滅しているとの報告がありました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00230_MINFILIA<tab>No more? Whatever do you mean?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00230_MINFILIA<tab>そんな……。
消滅……ですって……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00240_URIANGER<tab>I relate only that which hath been conveyed unto me by our agents. An aetheric wave of the highest magnitude was recorded in the region. Soon thereafter, 'twas observed that the isle had ceased to be.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00240_URIANGER<tab>シャーレアン本国の記録によると、
大規模な魔法波が観測されたようです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00250_URIANGER<tab>'Tis postulated that a magick was evoked, like in power to Ultima.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00250_URIANGER<tab>おそらく……。
古代魔法「アルテマ」級の魔法攻撃を受け、
瞬時に消滅したのではないかと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00260_MINFILIA<tab>Twelve preserve...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_A00260_MINFILIA<tab>いったい、何が起きたというの……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00010_LOLORITO<tab>If there are no other matters, I move that today's meeting be adjourned.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00010_LOLORITO<tab>では、本日の定例会合は終わるとしよう。
皆、ご苦労だった。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00020_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>It is done, my lord.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00020_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>旦那様に指示された準備は整いました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00030_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>I... <cough> F-Forgive my impertinence, my lord, but these orders... I am uncertain as to what end they serve.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00030_FOLLOWEROFTELEDJI<tab>しかし、このようなこと……。
いったい何をするおつもりなのです？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>Revolution.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_B00040_TELEDJIADELEDJI<tab>……戦争だよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00010_GILGAMESH<tab>Um. Well, then!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00010_GILGAMESH<tab>今日のところは これくらいにしといてやる！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00020_GILGAMESH<tab>That's enough of a beating for now!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_02200_C00020_GILGAMESH<tab>おぼえときな！ ぺっ！
